reference: That first blush of blue is where the night and day are trying to find harmony with each other.
source: Первый проблеск голубого неба пробивается там, где день и ночь стараются найти гармонию друг с другом.

errors.contrastive: That first blush of blue is where the morning and day are trying to find harmony with each other.

reference: And gaily and amusingly he told how after not sleeping all night he, in his sheep-skin coat, had rushed into Karenin's compartment.
source: И он весело и забавно рассказал, как он, не спав всю ночь, в полушубке ворвался в отделение Алексея Александровича.

errors.contrastive: And gaily and amusingly he told how after not sleeping all morning he, in his sheep-skin coat, had rushed into Karenin's compartment.

reference: You were served sukiyaki for dinner, then spent the night and had breakfast. Don't you think you were imposing?
source: Ты поел на ужин сукияки, провёл ночь и позавтракал. Тебе не кажется, что ты навязываешься?

errors.contrastive: You were served sukiyaki for dinner, then spent the morning and had breakfast. Don't you think you were imposing?

reference: Hotel booking information for the night from 4 to 5 May will be provided at a later stage.
source: Информация о резервировании мест в гостинице в ночь с 4 на 5 мая будет представлена позднее.

errors.contrastive: Hotel booking information for the morning from 4 to 5 May will be provided at a later stage.

reference: Every day a year and every night a century.
source: Каждый день как год и каждая ночь как столетие.

errors.contrastive: Every day a year and every morning a century.

reference: Indeed, on the night of the coup, these ultra-conservative Islamists appeared together with military leaders and the secular political leader Mohamed ElBaradei to announce Morsi’s overthrow.
source: Фактически, в ночь государственного переворота эти ультраконсервативные исламисты оказались рядом с военными лидерами и светским политическим лидером Мохаммедом эль-Барадеи во время объявления о свержении Мурси.

errors.contrastive: Indeed, on the morning of the coup, these ultra-conservative Islamists appeared together with military leaders and the secular political leader Mohamed ElBaradei to announce Morsi’s overthrow.

reference: And I asked him, and he said, "Oh, that thing? In the night, I die.
source: На что он ответил: «А, это? Видишь ли, каждую ночь я умираю.

errors.contrastive: And I asked him, and he said, "Oh, that thing? In the morning, I die.

reference: 'Oh, what a night!' cried Veslovsky, gazing at the corner of the hut and the carts, visible in the faint after-glow through the now open barn-doors as in a frame. 'Just listen!
source: -- Ах, какая ночь! -- сказал Весловский, глядя на видневшиеся при слабом свете зари в большой раме отворенных теперь ворот край избы и отпряженных катков. -- Да слушайте, это женские голоса поют и, право,недурно.

errors.contrastive: 'Oh, what a morning!' cried Veslovsky, gazing at the corner of the hut and the carts, visible in the faint after-glow through the now open barn-doors as in a frame. 'Just listen!

reference: I remember the night when I first saw the Milky Way.
source: Я помню ночь, когда я впервые увидел Млечный Путь.

errors.contrastive: I remember the morning when I first saw the Milky Way.

reference: In Murata commune, Kayanza province, FNL reportedly stole livestock and burnt two houses during the night of 16 October.
source: Как утверждается, в коммуне Мурато, провинция Каянза в ночь на 16 октября был украден скот и сожжено два дома.

errors.contrastive: In Murata commune, Kayanza province, FNL reportedly stole livestock and burnt two houses during the morning of 16 October.

reference: Were you with that man for the whole night?
source: И что ты делала с тем мужчиной всю ночь?

errors.contrastive: Were you with that man for the whole morning?

reference: But on the night of November 9th, when the wall and the barbed wire which had failed to irrevocably divide Germans over many decades of bitter separation began to crumble, communism's collapse became irreversible.
source: Но в ночь с 9 на 10 ноября, когда стена и колючая проволока, безвозвратно разделявшие Германию на протяжении многих десятилетий горькой разобщенности, начали рушиться, крах коммунизма стал неизбежным.

errors.contrastive: But on the morning of November 9th, when the wall and the barbed wire which had failed to irrevocably divide Germans over many decades of bitter separation began to crumble, communism's collapse became irreversible.

reference: Today, you hear these infernal machines going night and day.
source: Сегодня же вы слышите эти дьявольские машины, играющие день и ночь.

errors.contrastive: Today, you hear these infernal machines going morning and day.

reference: He took leave of him at the railway station on the seventh day, on returning from a bear-hunt, after which there had been demonstrations of Russian 'prowess' all night.
source: Он простился с ним на станции, возвращаясь с медвежьей охоты, где всю ночь у них было представление русского молодечества.

errors.contrastive: He took leave of him at the railway station on the seventh day, on returning from a bear-hunt, after which there had been demonstrations of Russian 'prowess' all morning.

reference: Hiding from the police, Dima spent the night in a dumpster.
source: Прячась от полиции, Дима провёл ночь в мусорном контейнере.

errors.contrastive: Hiding from the police, Dima spent the morning in a dumpster.

reference: The practice of forcing persons under interrogation to spend the night in the interrogation rooms lying handcuffed on the floor also amounts to torture.
source: Кроме того, пыткой является принуждение допрашиваемых лиц проводить ночь в наручниках на полу комнат для проведения допросов.

errors.contrastive: The practice of forcing persons under interrogation to spend the morning in the interrogation rooms lying handcuffed on the floor also amounts to torture.

reference: It was a general belief that the witch was naked when, at night, during the so-called Witch Sabbath, she danced with the devils.
source: И тот факт, что на так называемом Шабаше ведьмы всю ночь пляшут голыми, в компании бесов, вовсе не подвергался сомнению.

errors.contrastive: It was a general belief that the witch was naked when, at morning, during the so-called Witch Sabbath, she danced with the devils.

reference: As I write this, violent clashes with the police have been going on for nearly two weeks in the suburbs of Paris and other French cities, with cars being set on fire at a rate of nearly 1,000 per night.
source: В то самое время как я пишу это, жестокие столкновения с полицией продолжаются почти две недели в пригородах Парижа и других французских городов, и каждую ночь сгорает около 1000 машин.

errors.contrastive: As I write this, violent clashes with the police have been going on for nearly two weeks in the suburbs of Paris and other French cities, with cars being set on fire at a rate of nearly 1,000 per morning.

reference: So I swam through the night, and at dawn they got there and they started with prednisone shots.
source: Я продолжала плыть всю ночь. После их прибытия на рассвете мне сделали уколы кортикостеродов.

errors.contrastive: So I swam through the morning, and at dawn they got there and they started with prednisone shots.

reference: He had forgotten all the sufferings and raptures he had gone through on account of that work, when it alone had occupied him unremittingly day and night for three months. He had forgotten it, as he forgot all his finished pictures.
source: Забыл все страдания и восторги, которые он пережил с этою картиной, когда она несколько месяцев одна неотступно день и ночь занимала его, забыл, как он всегда забывал про оконченные картины.

errors.contrastive: He had forgotten all the sufferings and raptures he had gone through on account of that work, when it alone had occupied him unremittingly day and morning for three months. He had forgotten it, as he forgot all his finished pictures.

reference: Our agricultural production, marketing and processing initiative, through which the Government strives to increase the local production, marketing and processing of fruits, vegetables, livestock fodder and other agricultural products, is aimed at lessening our dependence on imports and promoting added value.
source: Наше сельскохозяйственное производство, инициатива по продаже и переработке сельскохозяйственной продукции, с помощью которой наше правительство стремится увеличить объем местного производства, продажу и переработку фруктов, овощей, корм для скота и другую сельскохозяйственную продукцию, направлены на уменьшение нашей зависимости от импорта и стимулирование добавленной стоимости.

errors.contrastive: Our agricultural production, marketing and processing initiative, through which the Government strives to increase the local production, marketing and processing of fruits, vegetables, livestock food and other agricultural products, is aimed at lessening our dependence on imports and promoting added value.

reference: They get their fodder from the fields and their milk from the cows.
source: У этих людей 1000 коров, ферм, 1000 рабочих и 1000 акров полей. Они получают корм с полей И их молоко от коров. Они делают мороженое на заводах и продают через сети магазинов.

errors.contrastive: They get their food from the fields and their milk from the cows.

reference: In this context, an important factor will be how the West treats its Muslims – as welcome citizens with equal rights and obligations, or as permanent outsiders and fodder for jihadist recruiters.
source: В данном контексте важным фактором станет отношение Запада к собственным мусульманам – будут ли они восприниматься как желанные граждане с равными правами и обязательствами или как вечные чужаки и корм для вербовщиков джихада.

errors.contrastive: In this context, an important factor will be how the West treats its Muslims – as welcome citizens with equal rights and obligations, or as permanent outsiders and food for jihadist recruiters.

reference: Nutrient-rich willow, lime and ash are all used as fodder crops.
source: Богатые на питательные вещества ива, липа и ясень используются как корм для скота.

errors.contrastive: Nutrient-rich willow, lime and ash are all used as food crops.

reference: Governments lose their legitimacy when they cannot guarantee their populations’ most basic needs: safe drinking water, staple food crops, and fodder and water for the animal herds on which communities depend for their meager livelihoods.
source: Правительства, неспособные гарантировать обеспечение самых элементарных потребностей своего народа, таких, как безопасная питьевая вода, урожаи основных сельскохозяйственных культур и корм и воду для скота, необходимые для поддержания жизни, теряют свой авторитет.

errors.contrastive: Governments lose their legitimacy when they cannot guarantee their populations’ most basic needs: safe drinking water, staple food crops, and food and water for the animal herds on which communities depend for their meager livelihoods.

reference: Or I too will have to eat gruel or fodder meant for the cow
source: Или мне тоже придётся есть кашу или корм для коров.

errors.contrastive: Or I too will have to eat gruel or food meant for the cow

reference: So if hair repels them and fodder attracts, confuse the beast, you've got him where you want him.
source: Так если волосы отпугивают из, а корм подманивает, животное путается, и ты можешь заполучить его где угодно.

errors.contrastive: So if hair repels them and food attracts, confuse the beast, you've got him where you want him.

reference: You may have been a good smuggler... but now you're Bantha fodder.
source: Ты, возможно, был хорошим контрабандистом... но теперь ты корм для бант.

errors.contrastive: You may have been a good smuggler... but now you're Bantha food.

reference: Continue to provoke me and the matter that contains your genius will finish up as so much animal fodder!
source: Продолжите меня провоцировать, и ваши тела пойдут на корм скоту, несмотря на всю гениальность!

errors.contrastive: Continue to provoke me and the matter that contains your genius will finish up as so much animal food!

reference: I can't throw away the blood, sweat, and tears of the people as fodder for the cows.
source: Я не могу выбросить кровь, пот и слезы на корм коровам.

errors.contrastive: I can't throw away the blood, sweat, and tears of the people as food for the cows.

reference: This sack of bantha fodder tried to buy me from that sleemo Calrissian and make me his servant.
source: Этот корм для бант пытался купить меня и сделать слугой.

errors.contrastive: This sack of bantha food tried to buy me from that sleemo Calrissian and make me his servant.

reference: Many a time when Levin had seen this valuable food wasted he had wanted to have it gathered up, but had found this impossible.
source: Сколько раз Левин, видя этот пропадающий прекрасный корм, хотел собирать его; но всегда это оказывалось невозможным.

errors.contrastive: Many a time when Levin had seen this valuable fodder wasted he had wanted to have it gathered up, but had found this impossible.

reference: Tom says that he's never tried eating dog food.
source: Том говорит, что никогда не пробовал собачий корм.

errors.contrastive: Tom says that he's never tried eating dog fodder.

reference: Australia's environmental assessment calculations using standard methodology showed that there was a high risk to birds from the use of monocrotophos when avian food items were sprayed.
source: Проведенные Австралией расчеты по оценке воздействия на окружающую среду с использование стандартной методологии показали, что птицы подвергаются большому риску при попадании монокротофоса на их корм в результате опрыскивания.

errors.contrastive: Australia's environmental assessment calculations using standard methodology showed that there was a high risk to birds from the use of monocrotophos when avian fodder items were sprayed.

reference: There was a dog food a while back called "Mr. Dog."
source: Был такой корм, черно-белый, назывался "Мистер Пес".

errors.contrastive: There was a dog fodder a while back called "Mr. Dog."

reference: Similarly, the dot-com bubble that preceded this period was marked by innovation – Web sites through which one could order dog food and soft drinks online.
source: Кроме того, пузырь доткомов, который предшествовал этот период был также сделан на основе инновации - веб-сайты, через которые можно было заказать корм для собак и безалкогольные напитки через Интернет.

errors.contrastive: Similarly, the dot-com bubble that preceded this period was marked by innovation – Web sites through which one could order dog fodder and soft drinks online.

reference: I've heard that people can eat cat food without any harmful effects.
source: Я слыхал, что человек может безо всякого вреда есть кошачий корм.

errors.contrastive: I've heard that people can eat cat fodder without any harmful effects.

reference: Invasion of new species competing for food and habitats could confound local recovery.
source: Вторжение новых видов, конкурирующих за корм и места обитания, может отрицательно сказаться на восстановлении в локальном масштабе.

errors.contrastive: Invasion of new species competing for fodder and habitats could confound local recovery.

reference: I'll take it back, but I need it to return all that cheap dog food.
source: Я отвезу её назад: она мне нужна, чтобы вернуть дешёвый собачий корм.

errors.contrastive: I'll take it back, but I need it to return all that cheap dog fodder.

reference: Americans and Europeans spent $17 billion on pet food, an increase in aid of $13 dollars would provide basic health and nutrition for everyone who lacks it in the world.
source: Американцы и европейцы тратят 17 миллиардов долларов на корм для домашних животных; если увеличить гуманитарную помощь до 13 миллиардов долларов, то можно было бы предоставить элементарную медицинскую помощь и накормить всех нуждающихся по всему миру.

errors.contrastive: Americans and Europeans spent $17 billion on pet fodder, an increase in aid of $13 dollars would provide basic health and nutrition for everyone who lacks it in the world.

reference: (2004), carp were fed food spiked with individual BDE congeners for 62 days, and tissue and excreta were examined.
source: (2004), в течение 62 суток карпам давали корм, содержавший отдельные БДЭ, после чего были проанализированы ткани и экскременты карпов.

errors.contrastive: (2004), carp were fed fodder spiked with individual BDE congeners for 62 days, and tissue and excreta were examined.

reference: "And food for my precious fish, of course..."
source: "И, конечно, корм для моих любимых рыбок..."

errors.contrastive: "And fodder for my precious fish, of course..."

reference: Remember, these are the type of people who once thought that selling dog food over the internet was a brilliant business strategy, and that by 2010 Qualcomm would be able to sell two mobile phones a year to everyone in the northern hemisphere.
source: Необходимо помнить, что это именно те люди, которые как-то подумали, что продавать собачий корм через интернет является блестящей идеей, и что к 2010 году "Куалкомм" сможет продавать по два мобильных телефона в год всем жителям северного полушария.

errors.contrastive: Remember, these are the type of people who once thought that selling dog fodder over the internet was a brilliant business strategy, and that by 2010 Qualcomm would be able to sell two mobile phones a year to everyone in the northern hemisphere.

reference: These resources could be provided by opulent societies, which consume billions of dollars in cosmetics, cigarettes, pet food, cars and the production of weapons.
source: Эти ресурсы могли бы предоставить богатые общества, которые тратят миллиарды долларов на косметику, сигареты, корм для домашних животных, автомобили и производство оружия.

errors.contrastive: These resources could be provided by opulent societies, which consume billions of dollars in cosmetics, cigarettes, pet fodder, cars and the production of weapons.

reference: I gave him a can of that dog food from your fancy gourmet place the other day.
source: Я на днях скормил ему тот корм из магазина деликатесов.

errors.contrastive: I gave him a can of that dog fodder from your fancy gourmet place the other day.

reference: On the contrary, when we confine animals in factory farms, we have to grow food for them.
source: Однако когда мы содержим животных взаперти на агропромышленных фермах, нам приходится выращивать корм для них.

errors.contrastive: On the contrary, when we confine animals in factory farms, we have to grow fodder for them.

reference: There are humans who gratuitously hunt and slaughter whales and market the products for dog food or lipstick.
source: Есть люди, которые бездумно охотятся и убивают китов, а затем производят из них собачий корм и губную помаду.

errors.contrastive: There are humans who gratuitously hunt and slaughter whales and market the products for dog fodder or lipstick.

reference: The fish eat the fish food and the shark eats the fish, but nobody eats a shark.
source: Рыбы едят рыбий корм... а акулы едят рыб... но никто не сможет съесть акулу.

errors.contrastive: The fish eat the fish fodder and the shark eats the fish, but nobody eats a shark.

reference: If you are lying, you will be food...for the mutants
source: Если ты лжешь, тебя саму отправят на корм... мутантам.

errors.contrastive: If you are lying, you will be fodder...for the mutants

reference: Djura my child, bring me that sprit from behind the door to mix the food.
source: Джуро, Джурице, сынок дедушкин, подай мне эту палку за дверью. Перемешать надо корм.

errors.contrastive: Djura my child, bring me that sprit from behind the door to mix the fodder.

reference: We could get a fortune for this one if we sold it to the Japs for hamburger meat and dog food.
source: Мы получили бы состояние за этого, если бы продали япошкам на мясо для гамбургеров и собачий корм.

errors.contrastive: We could get a fortune for this one if we sold it to the Japs for hamburger meat and dog fodder.

reference: This picture was taken 300 feet deep, catching new species of fish.
source: Этот снимок был сделан на глубине 100 метров, на нем снят новый вид рыбы.

errors.contrastive: This picture was taken 300 feet deep, catching new sight of fish.

reference: The biologist classifies the newly found species in its own genus, whereas other taxonomists want to put it into an established genus.
source: Биолог классифицирует вновь открытый вид в новый род, в то время как другие систематики желают поместить его в уже установленный род.

errors.contrastive: The biologist classifies the newly found sight in its own genus, whereas other taxonomists want to put it into an established genus.

reference: Significant differences can exist between the mean average price level for a product variety based on the full set of RPI quotes and the subset successfully matched with scanner data.
source: - могут возникнуть значительные различия между средним уровнем цен на вид товара, основанном на полном наборе цен ИРЦ, и подмножеством, успешно сопоставленным с данными сканирования.

errors.contrastive: Significant differences can exist between the mean average price level for a product sight based on the full set of RPI quotes and the subset successfully matched with scanner data.

reference: It's comparatively easy to comprehend how one species gave way to another. But perhaps more difficult to understand the evolutionary leap necessary to bridge the most sophisticated of the apes, with man.
source: Понять, как один вид уступал место другому, относительно просто, зато очень сложно представить эволюционный скачок, который, словно мостик, объединил наиболее развитых обезьян с человеком.

errors.contrastive: It's comparatively easy to comprehend how one sight gave way to another. But perhaps more difficult to understand the evolutionary leap necessary to bridge the most sophisticated of the apes, with man.

reference: The human species, which has been around for no more than 200,000 years, would have to deal with a more hostile physical environment than it has ever experienced.
source: Человек как вид, который существует не более 200 000 лет, будет вынужден иметь дело с более враждебной физической средой, чем ему приходилось сталкиваться до этого.

errors.contrastive: The human sight, which has been around for no more than 200,000 years, would have to deal with a more hostile physical environment than it has ever experienced.

reference: We've only been around for the past 200,000 years as a species, yet we've reached a population of more than six and a half billion people.
source: Как вид, мы существуем всего 200 000 лет, однако наше население уже достигло более шести с половиной миллиардов человек.

errors.contrastive: We've only been around for the past 200,000 years as a sight, yet we've reached a population of more than six and a half billion people.

reference: That species of bird is said to be in danger of dying out.
source: Говорят, что этот вид птиц находится на грани вымирания.

errors.contrastive: That sight of bird is said to be in danger of dying out.

reference: In practice the price collector will normally get the assistance of the shopkeeper to help in this process by asking which is the best selling product or variety.
source: На практике сборщик сведений о ценах, как правило, пользуется помощью хозяина магазина, спрашивая у него, какой товар или вид товаров пользуется наибольшим спросом.

errors.contrastive: In practice the price collector will normally get the assistance of the shopkeeper to help in this process by asking which is the best selling product or sight.

reference: It is well within our power to destroy our civilization and perhaps our species as well.
source: В наших силах уничтожить цивилизацию и, возможно, человеческий вид.

errors.contrastive: It is well within our power to destroy our civilization and perhaps our sight as well.

reference: Little comfort can be taken in the fact that a species survives if it persists only at a fraction of its historical abundance, or if it is restricted to a narrow part of where it once thrived.
source: Тот факт, что биологический вид продолжает свое существование, приносит мало утешения, если это происходит при значительном сокращении его исторической численности или ограничении области его обитания небольшой частью той территории, на которой он когда-то процветал.

errors.contrastive: Little comfort can be taken in the fact that a sight survives if it persists only at a fraction of its historical abundance, or if it is restricted to a narrow part of where it once thrived.

reference: So I can actually pick a species on a planet and then make them sentient.
source: Т.е. я могу выбрать на любой планете какой-нибудь вид — и сделать его разумным.

errors.contrastive: So I can actually pick a sight on a planet and then make them sentient.

reference: It is the right of no ecosystem, species, animal, vegetable, sea, river or lake to be eliminated or pushed to extinction by the irresponsible behaviour of human beings.
source: Это право состоит в обеспечении того, чтобы ни одна экосистема, ни один вид, ни одно животное, растение, море, река или озеро не исчезли или не были уничтожены в результате безответственного поведения человека.

errors.contrastive: It is the right of no ecosystem, sight, animal, vegetable, sea, river or lake to be eliminated or pushed to extinction by the irresponsible behaviour of human beings.

reference: Well, it came from it a long time ago, before your species evolved on Earth.
source: Ну, оно прибыло давным-давно, прежде, чем ваш вид развился на Земле.

errors.contrastive: Well, it came from it a long time ago, before your sight evolved on Earth.

reference: But one thing is clear: we, as a species, need to think more carefully about our impact on the nonhuman animal population and begin to take better account of these effects in our economic and environmental policies.
source: Но ясно одно: мы, как вид, должны думать более тщательно о нашем влиянии на нечеловеческое животное население и начинать лучше учитывать эти явления в нашей экономической и экологической политике.

errors.contrastive: But one thing is clear: we, as a sight, need to think more carefully about our impact on the nonhuman animal population and begin to take better account of these effects in our economic and environmental policies.

reference: Researchers have long known that the more intelligent the species, the larger the neocortex, the more likely it is to be deceptive.
source: Ученые уже давно знают, что чем умнее вид, чем больше развита у его представителей кора головного мозга, тем больше их склонность к обману.

errors.contrastive: Researchers have long known that the more intelligent the sight, the larger the neocortex, the more likely it is to be deceptive.

reference: The meeting noted with appreciation a report of the Convention on the Conservation of Antarctic Marine Living Resources on toothfish, a non-CITES-listed species (CoP14 Com.
source: Участники встречи с признательностью приняли к сведению доклад по клыкачу (рыбный вид, не занесенный в приложения к СИТЕС), подготовленный секретариатом Конвенции о сохранении морских живых ресурсов Антарктики (CoP14 Com. II Rep. 11).

errors.contrastive: The meeting noted with appreciation a report of the Convention on the Conservation of Antarctic Marine Living Resources on toothfish, a non-CITES-listed sight (CoP14 Com.

reference: Many individually unlikely events had to occur for our species and our technology to emerge.
source: Чтобы появился наш вид и наши технологии, должно было произойти много событий, самих по себе маловероятных.

errors.contrastive: Many individually unlikely events had to occur for our sight and our technology to emerge.

reference: As a species, human beings have a major self-control problem.
source: Как вид, человек имеет самые большие проблемы самоконтроля.

errors.contrastive: As a sight, human beings have a major self-control problem.

reference: We evolved as a species in the savanna lands of Africa, but then you see humans migrating into new environments, into desert lands, into jungles, into the ice age tundra of Siberia -- tough, tough environment -- into the Americas, into Australasia.
source: Мы сформировались как вид в Африканской саванне, но потом мы видим людей, мигрирующих в новых условиях - в пустынныe земли, в джунгли, в Сибирскую тундру Ледникового периода - суровую, суровую окружающую среду - в Северную и Южную Америку, в Австралоазию.

errors.contrastive: We evolved as a sight in the savanna lands of Africa, but then you see humans migrating into new environments, into desert lands, into jungles, into the ice age tundra of Siberia -- tough, tough environment -- into the Americas, into Australasia.

reference: Fishing will result in a combination of species being caught.
source: Ведение промысла будет приводить к тому, что вылавливаться будет не один только вид.

errors.contrastive: Fishing will result in a combination of sight being caught.

reference: Probably the sight of those strained arms, those muscles he had felt that morning when doing gymnastics, and the gleaming eyes, low voice and trembling jaws, convinced Vasenka more than the words.
source: Вероятно, вид этих напряженных рук, тех самых мускулов, которые он нынче утром ощупывал на гимнастике, и блестящих глаз, тихого голоса и дрожащих скул убедили Васеньку больше слов.

errors.contrastive: Probably the species of those strained arms, those muscles he had felt that morning when doing gymnastics, and the gleaming eyes, low voice and trembling jaws, convinced Vasenka more than the words.
Probably the variety of those strained arms, those muscles he had felt that morning when doing gymnastics, and the gleaming eyes, low voice and trembling jaws, convinced Vasenka more than the words.

reference: The sight of blood in Palestinian cities and the refugee camps is unbearable.
source: Непереносим вид крови в палестинских городах и лагерях беженцев.

errors.contrastive: The species of blood in Palestinian cities and the refugee camps is unbearable.
The variety of blood in Palestinian cities and the refugee camps is unbearable.

reference: Harris got his map out again, but the sight of it seemed to infuriate the mob.
source: (¬—≈ ¬ќ"ћ"ўјё"—я) 'аррис оп€ть достал карту, но ее вид по-видимому только разозлил толпу.

errors.contrastive: Harris got his map out again, but the species of it seemed to infuriate the mob.
Harris got his map out again, but the variety of it seemed to infuriate the mob.

reference: The sight of Russian tanks in a neighboring country on the 40th anniversary of the Soviet invasion of Czechoslovakia has shown that the temptations of power politics remain.
source: Вид российских танков в соседней стране в сороковую годовщину со дня Советского вторжения в Чехословакию показал, что искушения политики власти все еще сильны.

errors.contrastive: The species of Russian tanks in a neighboring country on the 40th anniversary of the Soviet invasion of Czechoslovakia has shown that the temptations of power politics remain.
The variety of Russian tanks in a neighboring country on the 40th anniversary of the Soviet invasion of Czechoslovakia has shown that the temptations of power politics remain.

reference: The sight of other persons, their words, his own recollections, gave him nothing but pain.
source: Вид других людей, их речи, свои собственные воспоминания -- все это было для него только мучительно.

errors.contrastive: The species of other persons, their words, his own recollections, gave him nothing but pain.
The variety of other persons, their words, his own recollections, gave him nothing but pain.

reference: The sight of thousands of persons bearing photographs of their lost family members amid the smoking ruins gave rise to a profound sense of empathy among Chileans.
source: Вид тысяч людей, держащих в руках фотографии погибших близких, на фоне дымящихся руин вызвал глубокое чувство сострадания у чилийского народа.

errors.contrastive: The species of thousands of persons bearing photographs of their lost family members amid the smoking ruins gave rise to a profound sense of empathy among Chileans.
The variety of thousands of persons bearing photographs of their lost family members amid the smoking ruins gave rise to a profound sense of empathy among Chileans.

reference: "The snug comfort of the close carriage... "...the pleasure of setting out with companions... "...the sight of the stars glinting fitfully through the trees..."
source: "...уют закрытого экипажа, прелесть утонченной беседы, вид звезд, мерцающих сквозь ветви деревьев"...

errors.contrastive: "The snug comfort of the close carriage... "...the pleasure of setting out with companions... "...the species of the stars glinting fitfully through the trees..."
"The snug comfort of the close carriage... "...the pleasure of setting out with companions... "...the variety of the stars glinting fitfully through the trees..."

reference: The sight of run-down physical infrastructure, punctuated by super-modern shopping malls with global consumer brand names well beyond the purchasing power of most citizens, is not what you would expect in an economy once described as a potential Asian Dragon.
source: Вид захудалой физической инфраструктуры, подчеркнутой сверхсовременными торговыми пассажами с товарами глобальных торговых брендов, стоимость которых далеко выходят за рамки покупательской способности большинства граждан, ‑ это не то, что ожидается увидеть от экономики, которую некогда называли потенциальным азиатским драконом.

errors.contrastive: The species of run-down physical infrastructure, punctuated by super-modern shopping malls with global consumer brand names well beyond the purchasing power of most citizens, is not what you would expect in an economy once described as a potential Asian Dragon.

The variety of run-down physical infrastructure, punctuated by super-modern shopping malls with global consumer brand names well beyond the purchasing power of most citizens, is not what you would expect in an economy once described as a potential Asian Dragon.

reference: The sight of his brother and the proximity of death renewed in Levin's soul that feeling of horror at the inscrutability, nearness, and inevitability of death which had seized him on that autumn evening when his brother had arrived in the country.
source: Вид брата и близость смерти возобновили в душе Левина то чувство ужаса пред неразгаданностью и вместе близостью и неизбежностью смерти, которое охватило его в тот осенний вечер, когда приехал к нему брат.

errors.contrastive: The species of his brother and the proximity of death renewed in Levin's soul that feeling of horror at the inscrutability, nearness, and inevitability of death which had seized him on that autumn evening when his brother had arrived in the country.

The variety of his brother and the proximity of death renewed in Levin's soul that feeling of horror at the inscrutability, nearness, and inevitability of death which had seized him on that autumn evening when his brother had arrived in the country.

reference: Today the image of very young children working in factories, in appalling conditions, is an all too familiar sight.
source: Сегодня вид совсем маленьких детей, работающих на фабриках в ужасных условиях, стал привычной картиной.

errors.contrastive: Today the image of very young children working in factories, in appalling conditions, is an all too familiar species.
Today the image of very young children working in factories, in appalling conditions, is an all too familiar variety.

reference: I hunger for meat and pleasures, and the mere sight of you smites any remaining joy.
source: Ибо я жажду мяса и удовольствий, но один только ваш вид уже портит мне ту малую радость жизни, что мне ещё осталась.

errors.contrastive: I hunger for meat and pleasures, and the mere species of you smites any remaining joy.
I hunger for meat and pleasures, and the mere variety of you smites any remaining joy.

reference: As a child, the mere sight of the dentist chair would cause me to break out in a cold sweat, as I anticipated my forthcoming encounter with the battery of gleaming instruments seemingly designed for the principal purpose of causing excruciating pain.
source: В детстве, один вид стоматологического кресла, мог бы заставить меня выйти в холодном поту, так как я ожидал свою будущую встречу с батареей блестящих инструментов, казалось бы, предназначенных для одной цели: причинение мучительной боли.

errors.contrastive: As a child, the mere species of the dentist chair would cause me to break out in a cold sweat, as I anticipated my forthcoming encounter with the battery of gleaming instruments seemingly designed for the principal purpose of causing excruciating pain.

As a child, the mere variety of the dentist chair would cause me to break out in a cold sweat, as I anticipated my forthcoming encounter with the battery of gleaming instruments seemingly designed for the principal purpose of causing excruciating pain.

reference: But she was still the same, and the sight of her still affected him physically, exhilarating and stimulating him and filling him with joy.
source: Но она была все та же; и вид ее все так же, физически оживляя, возбуждая и наполняя счастием его душу, подействовал на него.

errors.contrastive: But she was still the same, and the species of her still affected him physically, exhilarating and stimulating him and filling him with joy.
But she was still the same, and the variety of her still affected him physically, exhilarating and stimulating him and filling him with joy.

reference: The sight of children carrying machine guns and other weaponry and engaging in combat is absolutely unacceptable and totally reprehensible.
source: Вид детей с автоматами и другим оружием в руках, участвующих в боевых действиях, абсолютно неприемлем и совершенно отвратителен.

errors.contrastive: The species of children carrying machine guns and other weaponry and engaging in combat is absolutely unacceptable and totally reprehensible.
The variety of children carrying machine guns and other weaponry and engaging in combat is absolutely unacceptable and totally reprehensible.

reference: Swirling gases growing hotter and hotter... until it reaches a critical temperature... and transforms itself in to the most awesome sight in the universe.
source: Циркулирующие газы становятся горячее и горячее... пока это достигает критической температуры... и преобразовывает себя в наиболее устрашающий вид во вселенной.

errors.contrastive: Swirling gases growing hotter and hotter... until it reaches a critical temperature... and transforms itself in to the most awesome species in the universe.
Swirling gases growing hotter and hotter... until it reaches a critical temperature... and transforms itself in to the most awesome variety in the universe.

reference: The level of death and destruction in these hostilities simply defies the imagination, and the sight of so many civilians displaced from their homes and deprived of their livelihood, crowded into camps on both sides, is truly a disheartening experience.
source: Смертоносность и разрушительность этой вражды просто не поддаются воображению, а вид столь многочисленных гражданских лиц, изгнанных из их домов и лишенных средств к существованию, столпившихся в лагерях по обе стороны границы, представляет собой поистине ужасное зрелище.

errors.contrastive: The level of death and destruction in these hostilities simply defies the imagination, and the species of so many civilians displaced from their homes and deprived of their livelihood, crowded into camps on both sides, is truly a disheartening experience.

The level of death and destruction in these hostilities simply defies the imagination, and the variety of so many civilians displaced from their homes and deprived of their livelihood, crowded into camps on both sides, is truly a disheartening experience.

reference: The sight of Tracy affected me in a way I can't fully explain.
source: Вид Трейси в тот момент подействовал на меня таким образом, что я не могу теперь этого полностью объяснить.

errors.contrastive: The species of Tracy affected me in a way I can't fully explain.

reference: Distrusts, dislikes immensely... can't bear the sight of.

reference: Did he live now, this sight would make him do a desperate turn yea, curse his better angel from his side, and fall to reprobation.
source: А будь он жив, Твой вид его толкнул бы к богохульству, И, ангела-хранителя прогнав, Он был бы проклят небом.

reference: Victims, usually female, have repeatedly intimated that the sight of a male officer in uniform makes them relive the experience of the violation all over again.
source: Жертвы, как правило женщины, неоднократно в доверительной форме говорили, что вид офицера-мужчины в форме вновь напоминает им о совершенном насилии.

Victims, usually female, have repeatedly intimated that the variety of a male officer in uniform makes them relive the experience of the violation all over again.

reference: She has a cabinet, a minister of education, a minister for energy, a minister for health.

reference: The outbreak of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) in April 2003 and the avian influenza threat of early 2004 show that societies are vulnerable to any outbreak of emerging or resurgent infectious disease.

reference: Rapid and effective isolation of infected cases, together with efficient tracing and monitoring of the contacts made by those infected with SARS, allowed public health officials in Hong Kong, Toronto, Singapore, and Vietnam to contain the epidemic.
source: Быстрая и эффективная изоляция инфицированных случаев вместе с эффективным установлением и наблюдением над теми, кто был в контакте с инфицированными ТОРС, позволили чиновникам в области здравоохранения в Гонконге, Торонто, Сингапуре и Вьетнаме сдержать эпидемию.

errors.contrastive: Rapid and effective isolation of infected cases, together with efficient tracing and monitoring of the contacts made by those infected with torso, allowed public health officials in Hong Kong, Toronto, Singapore, and Vietnam to contain the epidemic.

reference: As a result, Taiwan can neither acquire the latest medical and health updates nor receive timely assistance when epidemics occur, as was the case with SARS.
source: Как следствие, Тайвань лишен возможности получать как самые последние данные в области медицины и здравоохранения, так и своевременную помощь при вспышках эпидемий, как это было в случае эпидемии ТОРС.

errors.contrastive: As a result, Taiwan can neither acquire the latest medical and health updates nor receive timely assistance when epidemics occur, as was the case with torso.

reference: Even assuming the best-case scenario--that SARS is eliminated by the end of this year--increased flu vaccination and better availability of diagnostics will benefit millions of people worldwide.

errors.contrastive: Continued surveillance and infection control measures will be required to ensure that the accomplishments of the last few months are not undone by a few undetected cases that touch off new torso hot spots.

reference: The East Asia and the Pacific region covers a diversity of situations in its 28 programme countries, with such cross-border problems as Avian flu, SARS and the Indian Ocean tsunami.

reference: If SARS is brought under control worldwide in the next few months, public health authorities will have achieved a great triumph.

reference: Intervention plans for emerging diseases such as Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS), West Nile Virus and the influenza pandemic have been developed.

errors.contrastive: But we would be foolish to think we have seen the last of torso, and it will take time for scientists to develop diagnostics, treatments, and vaccines.

errors.contrastive: The government’s anxiety at the sharper-than-expected economic slowdown was reflected in its heavy-handed intervention in July to freeze stock markets in the midst of a dramatic price correction.

errors.contrastive: From my window, I watched the Rubbish Gangster: shaven head, bull neck, and swollen bow, from which dangled mucus-incrusted strands of hair, his short arms bursting with criminal power.

reference: A new tax code was adopted, with lower and fewer taxes, notably a flat income tax of 13%.

reference: No code mattered to her before she broke it, but it came crashing down on her afterwards.

errors.contrastive: Yes, the IMF ought to develop a voluntary codex of conduct for SWF’s, but it should not be used as a weapon to enforce financial protectionism.

reference: A voluntary code of conduct was also developed by the Institute of International Finance, which proposed the Principles for Stable Capital Flows and Fair Debt Restructuring in Emerging Markets.

errors.contrastive: A voluntary codex of conduct was also developed by the Institute of International Finance, which proposed the Principles for Stable Capital Flows and Fair Debt Restructuring in Emerging Markets.

reference: While your behaviour clearly violates the letter of the honour code I do not believe it is in violation of the spirit.

source: Цепь для освещения только постоянного входа и выхода может рассматриваться в качестве одной из этих цепей.

errors.contrastive: A chain serving only permanent entry and exit lighting can be considered as one of these circuits.

reference: If the energy flowing through that arc were interrupted by a nonconductive material it is likely the circuit would be broken.
source: Если поток энергии, проходящий через дугу, будет прерван непроводящим материалом, то есть большая вероятность того, что цепь разорвётся и дуга исчезнет.

errors.contrastive: If the energy flowing through that arc were interrupted by a nonconductive material it is likely the chain would be broken.

reference: As the tube rises, the mercury collects at the lower end, providing a conductive path to complete the circuit.
source: При подъеме одного из концов трубки ртуть скапливается в нижнем конце, создавая электропроводящий тракт, замыкающий цепь.

errors.contrastive: As the tube rises, the mercury collects at the lower end, providing a conductive path to complete the chain.

reference: This whole place can't be wired to just one circuit.
source: Не может же быть единая цепь на всё здание.

errors.contrastive: This whole place can't be wired to just one chain.

reference: A circuit serving only permanent entry and exit lighting can be considered as one of these circuits.
source: Цепь, служащая для освещения только постоянного входа и выхода, может рассматриваться в качестве одной из этих цепей.

errors.contrastive: A chain serving only permanent entry and exit lighting can be considered as one of these circuits.

reference: It must have a permanent electricity supply from an electrical circuit protected from power failures, fitted with its own fuse protection and directly connected to the energy source.
source: Прибор должен быть постоянно включен в электрическую цепь, защищенную от сбоев в подаче энергии, снабжен собственными предохранителями и непосредственно подсоединен к источнику питания.

errors.contrastive: It must have a permanent electricity supply from an electrical chain protected from power failures, fitted with its own fuse protection and directly connected to the energy source.

reference: We could open a circuit... between the car and the chair.
source: Мы могли бы открыть цепь... между машиной и креслом.

reference: A circuit serving only permanent entry and exit lighting can be considered as one of these circuits.

errors.contrastive: A chain serving only permanent entry and exit lighting can be considered as one of these circuits.

reference: Let's just collect this circuit, and I think I'd better see this one.

reference: Relays are often used to switch large current loads by supplying relatively small current loads to a control circuit.

source: Цепь, служащая для освещения только постоянного входа и выхода, может рассматриваться в качестве одной из этих цепей.

errors.contrastive: A chain serving only permanent entry and exit lighting can be considered as one of these circuits.

reference: A circuit serving only permanent entry and exit lighting can be considered as one of these circuits.
source: Цепь для освещения только постоянного входа и выхода может рассматриваться в качестве одной из этих цепей.

source: Гарантийная цепь может также в любое время направить запрос о статусе выданных ею гарантий и получить соответствующую информацию о перевозке МДП.

reference: A chain of additional losses occurs when the inflated assets have been purchased with borrowed money.
source: Цепь дополнительных потерь происходит, когда завышенные активы были приобретены на заемные деньги.

source: И когда вы собираете цепь, вы по сути програмируете ее.

errors.contrastive: So as you assemble the circuit, you're basically programming it.

reference: In one country, he was able to find suppliers of those goods, to establish an office, to open multiple bank accounts and to procure and ship to a third country various missile parts and components through a chain of private companies and intermediaries.
source: В одной стране ему удалось найти поставщиков этих товаров, создать отделение, открыть многочисленные банковские счета, закупить и поставить в третью страну различные части и компоненты ракет через цепь частных компаний и посредников.

reference: Hey, Nick, how about taking the chain off?
source: Эй, Ник, может быть, нам разорвать цепь?

errors.contrastive: Hey, Nick, how about taking the circuit off?

reference: If a bubble develops, and if the bubble does not deflate but collapses, threatening to cause a depression, the Fed would have the policy tools to short-circuit that chain.
source: Если пузырь будет надуваться, и если он не сдуется, а лопнет, угрожая вызвать депрессию, то Федеральная резервная система будет располагать инструментами политики, необходимыми для того, чтобы замкнуть эту цепь.

errors.contrastive: If a bubble develops, and if the bubble does not deflate but collapses, threatening to cause a depression, the Fed would have the policy tools to short-circuit that circuit.

reference: And the other is Moksha-Yug Access, which is integrating rural supply chain on the foundations of self-help group-based microfinance.

errors.contrastive: And the other is Moksha-Yug Access, which is integrating rural supply circuit on the foundations of self-help group-based microfinance.

reference: Cross-border movements of recruits, even though some were disarmed through the rehabilitation and reintegration programmes in Liberia, suggests that the chain of command with the former faction chiefs, especially those of MODEL, still functions.
source: Трансграничное передвижение завербованных комбатантов, даже учитывая, что некоторые из них были разоружены в ходе программ реабилитации и реинтеграции в Либерии, свидетельствует о том, что все еще функционирует цепь командования во главе с бывшими руководителями группировок, особенно группировки Движения за демократию в Либерии.

errors.contrastive: Cross-border movements of recruits, even though some were disarmed through the rehabilitation and reintegration programmes in Liberia, suggests that the circuit of command with the former faction chiefs, especially those of MODEL, still functions.

reference: We must break the chain of events that led up to it and going out of here might be just what we're not supposed to do.
source: Мы должны нарушить цепь событий, которые привели к этому и выбраться отсюда, может так, как мы не предполагали это делать.

errors.contrastive: We must break the circuit of events that led up to it and going out of here might be just what we're not supposed to do.

reference: But the results often fall short of the potential benefits, because VAT has helped inspire tax evaders to create even stronger networks that can hide an entire chain of transactions.
source: Но результаты часто не соответствуют потенциальной выгоде, потому что НДС помогает вдохновить неплательщиков налогов на создание еще более мощных сетей, способных скрыть целую цепь сделок.

reference: So we'll have to use our computers to try to unscramble the chain.

reference: In 2005, the Global Strategy had identified the need to radically improve the entire logistics and distribution chain to support ambitious growth targets.
source: В 2005 году в рамках глобальной стратегии была выявлена необходимость коренным образом усовершенствовать всю цепь материально-технического снабжения и распространения в целях содействия достижению высоких целевых показателей роста.

errors.contrastive: In 2005, the Global Strategy had identified the need to radically improve the entire logistics and distribution circuit to support ambitious growth targets.

reference: I want an unbroken chain of love in this tent tonight.
source: я хочу, чтобы сегодн€ под этим сводом по€вилась неразрывна€ цепь любви.

errors.contrastive: I want an unbroken circuit of love in this tent tonight.

reference: Even more poisonous is a chain of monopolies offering complementary goods.

errors.contrastive: Even more poisonous is a circuit of monopolies offering complementary goods.

reference: All the major rivers in south India are sourced in the Western Ghats, the chain of hills running along the west coast of India.
source: Все главные реки в южной Индии берут своё начало в Западных Гатах, цепь холмов которых простирается вдоль западного побережья Индии.

errors.contrastive: All the major rivers in south India are sourced in the Western Ghats, the circuit of hills running along the west coast of India.

reference: The Guarantee Chain sends information on each issued guarantee to the eTIR international system.

errors.contrastive: The Guarantee circuit sends information on each issued guarantee to the eTIR international system.

reference: Is this true that they found a golden chain she stole from her masters.

errors.contrastive: Is this true that they found a golden circuit she stole from her masters.

reference: In all these examples, there's one ideal form, because these are thought in terms of structure.
source: Во всех этих примерах присутствует определенная идеальная форма, потому что они были задуманы с позиции лежащей в их основе конструкции.

errors.contrastive: In all these examples, there's one ideal uniform, because these are thought in terms of structure.

reference: The contents of the letter were just what he expected, but its form was unexpected and particularly unpleasant to him.
source: Содержание было то самое,как он ожидал,но форма была неожиданная и особенно неприятная ему.

errors.contrastive: The contents of the letter were just what he expected, but its uniform was unexpected and particularly unpleasant to him.

reference: Democracy is the worst form of government, except all the others that have been tried.
source: Демократия — наихудшая форма правления, если не считать всех остальных, испробованных до нее.

errors.contrastive: Democracy is the worst uniform of government, except all the others that have been tried.

reference: The specific form, the detailed provisions and the authorities involved in the preparation and conclusion of such a Partnership Agreements are to be decided by the parties involved.
source: Конкретная форма, подробные положения и органы, участвующие в подготовке и заключении таких соглашений о партнерстве, определяются заинтересованными сторонами.

errors.contrastive: The specific uniform, the detailed provisions and the authorities involved in the preparation and conclusion of such a Partnership Agreements are to be decided by the parties involved.

reference: There is only one form of life that matters. Dalek life.
source: Есть только одна форма жизни, которая имеет значение жизнь Далека.

errors.contrastive: There is only one uniform of life that matters. Dalek life.

reference: Especially in the US, a man can lose his job for making an “inappropriate” sexual remark, marriages collapse because of a one-night stand, and any form of sex with children is an absolute taboo.
source: Особенно в США, человек может потерять свою работу, если сделает “неуместное” сексуальное замечание, браки рушатся из-за случайной связи, и любая форма секса с детьми является абсолютным табу.

errors.contrastive: Especially in the US, a man can lose his job for making an “inappropriate” sexual remark, marriages collapse because of a one-night stand, and any uniform of sex with children is an absolute taboo.

reference: The Tempus programme is more than a form of cooperation.
source: Программа Tempus - это более, чем просто форма сотрудничества.

errors.contrastive: The Tempus programme is more than a uniform of cooperation.

reference: Glamour is a form of falsification, but falsification to achieve a particular purpose.
source: Гламур — это особая форма фальсификации, которая, создаётся для достижения определённого эффекта.

errors.contrastive: Glamour is a uniform of falsification, but falsification to achieve a particular purpose.

reference: And I fear that with the multiplication of these positions they become a mere form.
source: И я боюсь, что при таком множестве этих дел это только форма.

errors.contrastive: And I fear that with the multiplication of these positions they become a mere uniform.

reference: I won't stake my reputation on it, but I think it's a genuine alien life form.
source: Не хочу рисковать своей репутацией, но я думаю, что это подлинная внеземная форма жизни.

errors.contrastive: I won't stake my reputation on it, but I think it's a genuine alien life uniform.

reference: Whatever the circumstances and the precise form of an agreement, the intention of the parties should be clear from the outset.
source: Какими бы ни были обстоятельства или конкретная форма соглашения, стороны с самого начала четко обозначают свои намерения.

errors.contrastive: Whatever the circumstances and the precise uniform of an agreement, the intention of the parties should be clear from the outset.

reference: To us, your form of life is ugly... as we appear to you.
source: Для нас, уродлива Ваша форма жизни, как наша, по всей видимости, для Вас.

errors.contrastive: To us, your uniform of life is ugly... as we appear to you.

reference: This is another form of solidarity, which also exists in the EU, where regional development funds are allocated to poorer regions to foster catch-up growth.
source: Это ‑ другая форма солидарности, которая также существует в ЕС, где фонды регионального развития ассигнованы более бедным регионам, чтобы способствовать их догоняющему росту.

errors.contrastive: This is another uniform of solidarity, which also exists in the EU, where regional development funds are allocated to poorer regions to foster catch-up growth.

reference: In the NIS, people were accustomed to another form of organisation, which was the production co-operative, in other words, the collective farm.
source: В странах ННГ более привычна другая форма организации - производственные кооперативы, другими словами коллективные хозяйства.

errors.contrastive: In the NIS, people were accustomed to another uniform of organisation, which was the production co-operative, in other words, the collective farm.

reference: The frilly crenulated forms that you see in corals, and kelps, and sponges and nudibranchs, is a form of geometry known as hyperbolic geometry.
source: Украшенные оборками мелкозубчатые формы, которые вы видите в кораллах, и в ламинариях, губках, голожаберных моллюсках — это форма геометрии, известная как гиперболическая геометрия.

errors.contrastive: The frilly crenulated forms that you see in corals, and kelps, and sponges and nudibranchs, is a uniform of geometry known as hyperbolic geometry.

reference: Democracy is the worst form of government, except all the others that have been tried.
source: Демократия — наихудшая форма правления, если не считать всех остальных.

errors.contrastive: Democracy is the worst uniform of government, except all the others that have been tried.

reference: Guiding principle 2: Whatever form the private partnership takes the arrangement should be one, which encourages trust and a sense of mutual ownership between the parties.
source: Руководящий принцип 2 Какой бы ни была форма партнерства с частным сектором, его механизм должен побуждать стороны к взаимному доверию и формировать чувство взаимной сопричастности.

errors.contrastive: Guiding principle 2: Whatever uniform the private partnership takes the arrangement should be one, which encourages trust and a sense of mutual ownership between the parties.

reference: Surely a life form advanced enough for space travel is advanced enough to eventually understand our motives.
source: Разумеется, форма жизни, достаточно развитая для космических путешествий, также достаточно развита, чтобы понять, наконец, наши мотивы.

errors.contrastive: Surely a life uniform advanced enough for space travel is advanced enough to eventually understand our motives.

reference: By contrast, the US has an “asymmetric” form of government, which allows many overlapping government entities – 7,000 in California alone – to incur debts, hire and fire employees, and impose taxes.
source: В отличие от этого, в США распространена «асимметричная» форма правительства, которая позволяет множеству государственных организаций с пересекающимися функциями - в одной только Калифорнии их 7000 – влезать в долги, нанимать и увольнять сотрудников и устанавливать налоги.

errors.contrastive: By contrast, the US has an “asymmetric” uniform of government, which allows many overlapping government entities – 7,000 in California alone – to incur debts, hire and fire employees, and impose taxes.

reference: The Tads technical dissemination project Today's co-operatives A new form of agricultural organisation in NIS

errors.contrastive: The Tads technical dissemination project Today's co-operatives A new uniform of agricultural organisation in NIS

reference: So, I wanted to show 2.3 million prison uniforms, and in the actual print of this piece, each uniform is the size of a nickel on its edge.
source: Поэтому я решил изобразить 2.3 миллиона тюремных форм, и в оригинальной печати этой картины, каждая форма размером с ребро монеты в пять центов.

errors.contrastive: So, I wanted to show 2.3 million prison uniforms, and in the actual print of this piece, each form is the size of a nickel on its edge.

reference: The fact that, after renegotiation, the revisions would not necessarily result in a uniform definition of the terms “writing”, “signature” and “document” casts even more doubt on the prospects for success of such a process.
source: Эффективность подобных процедур представляется тем более сомнительной, поскольку разработка пересмотренных вариантов в ходе переговоров отнюдь не обязательно позволит выработать идентичные определения терминов "письменная форма", "подпись" и "документ".

errors.contrastive: The fact that, after renegotiation, the revisions would not necessarily result in a form definition of the terms “writing”, “signature” and “document” casts even more doubt on the prospects for success of such a process.

reference: My friend, new uniform, new boots, medals, and what about war credits?

errors.contrastive: My friend, new form, new boots, medals, and what about war credits?

reference: It is hard to see why I am less entitled to privacy because I am turned on by a Nazi uniform than I would be if I were excited by a pair of knickers.

errors.contrastive: It is hard to see why I am less entitled to privacy because I am turned on by a Nazi form than I would be if I were excited by a pair of knickers.

errors.contrastive: It was only a few miles to the area occupied by their Prussian allies where this Officer's form and papers should allow him to travel without suspicion and to stay ahead of the news of his desertion.

reference: You're still wearing the Coldstream Guards uniform, furthermore, you can have the phone now.

reference: A uniform is simply nothing more than a garment.

errors.contrastive: A form is simply nothing more than a garment.
